data.title: Collector groups HERZ HERTZ F533, HERTZ F532, etc. — buy original HERZ equipment
data.meta_description: Collector groups HERTZ F533, HERTZ F532, etc. HERZ — original equipment at factory prices! Compliance with all technical standards is guaranteed. Our consultants will be happy to help you choose herz product. E-mail: hzr@nt-rt.ru
data.text:
Floor-by-floor modules of the apartment-by-apartment distribution of the heat carrier with thermal energy metering devices. It is used to create a floor-by-floor heating system with highly efficient balancing and apartment-by-apartment heat metering. The module is placed in a cabinet or on a mounting frame.

Floor modules. Technical description.

Floor-by-floor distributors are designed to control the start, stop and direction of fluid flow in two or more hydraulic lines, depending on the presence of an external control action.

Models: 8542, 8543.

HERTZ 8542 | 8543. Technical description.

Rod distributors consist of direct and reverse flow distributors with locking boxes, a tap for air discharge and water discharge, end caps and fasteners.

Models: 8534, 8532, 8531.

HERTZ 8534, 8532, 8531. Technical description.

Cabinets with control unit - ready-to-install control cabinets for surface heating systems (from 3 to 12 circuits) and the possibility of connecting two additional unregulated circuits (radiator heating or control cabinets).

Models: F533, F532.

HERTZ F533, F532. Technical description.

Control modules for underfloor heating systems Compact Floor FWW - ready-to-install control modules for underfloor heating, connected from below with a tap at an angle of 90°.

Models: E533, F533, F532.

HERTZ E533. Technical description.

HERTZ F533. Technical description.

HERTZ F532. Technical description.

Price list
